name: Revive.so – Bulk Rewrite and Republish Blog Posts
author: Revive.so

sections.description: Revive.so is the ultimate WordPress plugin for content rejuvenation. Republish and recirculate evergreen posts with a simple click. This will boost your content’s visibility, engagement, and SEO rankings. Don’t let your valuable content fade into obscurity.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1 – 10.05.2024

  • Fixed: Documentation link doesn’t point to the correct URL ( #40 )
  • Fixed: Hide settings when functionality disabled ( #44 )
  • Fixed: Settings don’t displayed the correctly saved values ( #35 )

2.0.0 – 08.05.2024

  • Changed: Changed whole UI, added Tailwind to the plugin ( #38 )

1.0.6 – 19.03.2024

  • Fixed: PHP 8.x compatibility issues ( #32 )
  • Fixed: Post republish eligibility age issue ( #33 )

1.0.5 – 11.03.2024

  • Added: Instant Indexing upsell ( #20 )
  • Changed: Hide the “Scheduled Tasks” menu entry ( #30 )

1.0.4 – 01.03.2024

  • Added: Extensions page ( #27 )
  • Changed: Removed other notifications from plugin’s screen ( #11 )
  • Added: Fields sorting by priority ( #25 )

1.0.3 – 22.02.2024

  • Added: Upsell sub-tab for instant indexing addon ( #20 )
  • Changed: Removed unused action/method ( #21 )
  • Changed: Moved all upsell settings to the upsells class ( #19 )
  • Changed: Updated Tools settings pannel display ( #4 )
  • Changed: Hid tools tab and made a filter to display it. ( #15 )
  • Changed: Removed social tab upsells ( #16 )
  • Changed: Updated plugin’s author ( #14 )
  • Changed: Moved ‘Single’ and ‘Notification’ upsells in General setting section ( #17 )
  • Fixed: AJAX 500 error when trying to filter by Taxonomies ( #22 )

1.0.2 – 16.02.2024

  • Added: Filter so external plugins can update the dashboard header tag ( #13 )
  • Changed: Enhanced Rewriting tab display. ( #12 )

1.0.1 – 15.02.2024

  • Changed: Ehanced settings readability. ( #6 )

1.0.1 – 15.02.2024

  • Changed: Ehanced settings readability. ( #6 )
  • Changed: Redesigned subtab navigation. ( #8 )
  • Added: Rewriting information subtab. ( #7 )
  • Added: Revived Posts page modal upsell. ( #9 )

1.0.0 – 07.11.2023

Release.

short_description: Revive.so is the ultimate WordPress plugin for content rejuvenation. Republish and recirculate evergreen posts with a simple click.
